summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3519 for the improvement of East Pacific Street, from the west margin of 11th Avenue Northeast to the existing pavement at a point approximately 500 feet east of the east margin of 15th Avenue Northeast; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 43598, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund. .
